channel.title: Team_model should also change team_headmodel like what model does with headmodel
channel.description: I always found it annoying that you had to set both team_model & team_headmodel when setting your player model. model & headmodel do this, so it only seems right to do it with team_model as well... Do you agree, @zturtleman?

item.title: Team_model should also change team_headmodel like what model does with headmodel
item.dc:creator: @coltongit Coltongit
item.description:
@coltongit wrote:

Should be possible to port it over & set the team_headmodel thing to whatever head the players use, then make it go blank again when a model isn’t loaded.

Read full topic
item.source: Team_model should also change team_headmodel like what model does with headmodel

item.title: Team_model should also change team_headmodel like what model does with headmodel
item.dc:creator: @zturtleman ZTM
item.description:
@zturtleman wrote:

Yeah, there isn’t really a reason that there is not a team_model command that also sets team_headmodel. In Turtle Arena I made blank [team_]headmodel use value from [team_]model, but adding a command like Q3’s model command probably fit better (especially in Team Arena as it sets team_headmodel in regular use).

Read full topic
item.source: Team_model should also change team_headmodel like what model does with headmodel
